biotools.summary:
Linear Epitope Prediction Using Deep Protein Sequence Embeddings.

EpitopeVec predicts linear B-cell epitopes. It takes protein sequences (FASTA format) as input and then lists the peptides (of a given amino acids length) that can be epitopes along with their respective prediction probability.
